Progress will discontinue Telerik Platform on May 10th, 2018. Learn more

kendoui notes

Usage Synopsis
All versions $ appbuilder kendoui notes [--verified] [--latest]
Only Kendo UI Core versions $ appbuilder kendoui notes --core [--verified] [--latest]
Only Kendo UI Professional versions $ appbuilder kendoui notes --professional [--verified] [--latest]

Shows the release notes for a selected Kendo UI Core or Kendo UI Professional package. The verified tag marks stable Kendo UI Service Pack releases.

Options

  • --verified - Lists stable Kendo UI Service Pack packages.
  • --core - Lists Kendo UI Core versions.
  • --professional - Lists Kendo UI Professional versions.
  • --latest - Lists the latest available Kendo UI packages.

Command Limitations

  • You cannot run this command on NativeScript projects.
  • You cannot set --core and --professional simultaneously.

Related Commands

Command Description
kendoui Lists the available Kendo UI Core or Kendo UI Professional packages that you can add to your project.
kendoui install Updates or adds Kendo UI Code or Kendo UI Professional to your project.
plugin Lists all Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules that are currently enabled for your project.
plugin add Enables a Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules for your project.
plugin configure Configures plugin variables for selected core, integrated or verified Apache Cordova plugins.
plugin remove Disables Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules from your project.
plugin find Searches by one or more keywords for Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules.
plugin fetch Imports the selected Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules into your project.
